testimonials.content: Super friendly and approachable guy. Could handle any problem I threw at him and always explained it in a very understandable way.

testimonials.author: Anonymous Review - Batch #190
testimonials.content: Made issues simple, fun and seem easy to overcome. Very good communicator and great css styling tips. A really great guy and always fun to have around.

testimonials.author: Anonymous Review - Batch #222
testimonials.content: Amazing developer and teacher, what I liked the most about his lessons was the fact that he seemed super confident, honest and patient.

testimonials.author: Anonymous Review - Batch #222
testimonials.content: Ben is super nice and great at walking you through the steps needed to solve a front-end problem. He's also very humble despite having really amazing front-end skills.

testimonials.content: Front-end legend! Very nice, careful and passionate. Always takes the time to answer all of your questions, even if the busiest times. He guides students very well! Fun guy too!

testimonials.content: Fanning has a great manner of solving the problem with the student. He's incredibly personable so is great to have as a calming influence.

testimonials.content: A lot of design knowledge with a side of humour, Ben Fanning was very professional.

testimonials.content: An excellent teacher and a highly skilled programmer, always happy to help and offer his expert advice.

testimonials.author: Anonymous Review - Batch #360
testimonials.content: Mister Fanning always brings the enthusiasm for the day and always have a good laugh when he's around. Always the go-to guy for any front end issues.

testimonials.author: Anonymous Review - Batch #388
testimonials.content: Ben has a way of presenting information that is remarkably structured, clear, and precise, just like his problem-solving process. Super helpful.

testimonials.author: Anonymous Review - Batch #388
testimonials.content: Great guy, really professional and nice. I felt like my issues were simple when he helped me solved them but he didn't make me feel stupid for not knowing how to resolve them.

testimonials.author: Anonymous Review - Batch #390
testimonials.content: Ben commands respect merely through the deep knowledge of his craft and his disciplined approach. His experience as a full-time developer informs his teaching style bringing a very realistic approach to developing and delivering a polished project that would stand not just at the end of the bootcamp but in the real world as well. Definitely someone you can learn a lot from.

testimonials.author: Anonymous Review - Batch #423
testimonials.content: Ben knows his stuff and is really good at explaining and communicating to you the issue you dont understand. Great at problem solving and making lectures fun. Chilled personality - just makes a better learning environment.

testimonials.author: Anonymous Review - Batch #473
testimonials.content: Ben's a nice guy, knowledgeable and a real people person too. All good qualities.
